name: Pet Doctor
summary: Pet Doctor is a VR and arcade idle game where players step into the role of a veterinarian responsible for caring for a variety of animals. Players must use their skills to diagnose and treat different pets while managing and upgrading their clinic. With a diverse range of animals to care for and a calming gameplay experience, Pet Doctor offers engaging and rewarding gameplay for anyone who enjoys strategy and simulation games. Expand your clinic, treat your patients, and become the ultimate pet
